title: Breakable Component Schema
description: Defines properties for entities that have health and can be broken or destroyed.

currentHp.description: Current hit points of the breakable entity.

maxHp.description: Maximum hit points the entity can have.

isBroken.description: Indicates if the entity has been destroyed (HP reached 0 or condition met).

resistance.description: Optional identifier for damage resistance type (e.g., 'wood', 'stone', 'metal'). Specific values and interpretation depend on the game's damage system. Consider defining an enum if specific types are known.
